trans-unit.source: You can enable clipping by setting the ItemClipsToShape or ItemClipsChildrenToShape flags. The item's clip path is calculated by intersecting all clipping ancestors' shapes. If the item sets ItemClipsToShape, the final clip is intersected with the item's own shape.
trans-unit.target: 您可以通过设置ItemClipsToShape或ItemClipsChildrenToShape标志来启用剪切。该项目的剪切路径是通过将所有剪切祖先的形状相交来计算的。如果项目设置了ItemClipsToShape，则最终剪辑将与项目自身的形状相交。

trans-unit.source: You can even change the order of the wizard buttons to any arbitrary order using setButtonLayout(), and you can add up to three custom buttons (e.g., a Print button) to the button row. This is achieved by calling setButton() or setButtonText() with CustomButton1, CustomButton2, or CustomButton3 to set up the button, and by enabling the HaveCustomButton1, HaveCustomButton2, or HaveCustomButton3 options. Whenever the user clicks a custom button, customButtonClicked() is emitted. For example:
trans-unit.target: 您甚至可以使用setButtonLayout（）将向导按钮的顺序更改为任意顺序，并且可以在按钮行中最多添加三个自定义按钮（例如，“ 打印”按钮）。这可以通过调用带有CustomButton1，CustomButton2或CustomButton3的setButton（）或setButtonText（）来设置按钮，以及启用HaveCustomButton1，HaveCustomButton2或HaveCustomButton3选项来实现。每当用户单击自定义按钮时，都会发出customButtonClicked（）。例如：

trans-unit.source: You can even store QList<QVariant> and QMap<QString, QVariant> values in a variant, so you can easily construct arbitrarily complex data structures of arbitrary types. This is very powerful and versatile, but may prove less memory and speed efficient than storing specific types in standard data structures.
trans-unit.target: 您甚至可以将QList < QVariant >和QMap < QString，QVariant >值存储在一个变量中，因此可以轻松构造任意类型的任意复杂数据结构。这是非常强大和通用的，但与在标准数据结构中存储特定类型相比，可能会证明其内存和速度效率较低。

trans-unit.source: You can even store QList<QVariant> and QMap<QString, QVariant> values in a variant, so you can easily construct arbitrarily complex data structures of arbitrary types. This is very powerful and versatile, but may prove less memory and speed efficient than storing specific types in standard data structures.
trans-unit.target: 您甚至可以将QList <QVariant>和QMap < QString，QVariant>值存储在一个变量中，因此您可以轻松地构造任意类型的任意复杂的数据结构。这是非常强大和通用的，但与在标准数据结构中存储特定类型相比，可能会证明其内存和速度效率较低。

trans-unit.source: You can explicitly scroll to any position on the scene by using the scroll bars, or by calling centerOn(). By passing a point to centerOn(), QGraphicsView will scroll its viewport to ensure that the point is centered in the view. An overload is provided for scrolling to a QGraphicsItem, in which case QGraphicsView will see to that the center of the item is centered in the view. If all you want is to ensure that a certain area is visible, (but not necessarily centered,) you can call ensureVisible() instead.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用滚动条或调用centerOn（）显式滚动到场景中的任何位置。通过将一个点传递给centerOn（），QGraphicsView将滚动其视口以确保该点在视图中居中。提供了一个重载来滚动到QGraphicsItem，在这种情况下QGraphicsView将看到该项目的中心在视图中居中。如果只需要确保某个区域可见（但不必居中），则可以调用sureVisible（）。

trans-unit.source: You can explicitly scroll to any position on the scene by using the scroll bars, or by calling centerOn(). By passing a point to centerOn(), QGraphicsView will scroll its viewport to ensure that the point is centered in the view. An overload is provided for scrolling to a QGraphicsItem, in which case QGraphicsView will see to that the center of the item is centered in the view. If all you want is to ensure that a certain area is visible, (but not necessarily centered,) you can call ensureVisible() instead.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用滚动条或调用centerOn（）显式滚动到场景中的任何位置。通过将一个点传递给centerOn（），QGraphicsView将滚动其视口以确保该点在视图中居中。提供了用于滚动到QGraphicsItem的重载，在这种情况下，QGraphicsView将看到项目的中心在视图中居中。如果只需要确保某个区域可见（但不必居中），则可以调用sureVisible（）。

trans-unit.source: You can export lights of any type from Blender to use in Qt Quick 3D.
trans-unit.target: 你可以从Blender导出任何类型的灯光,在Qt Quick 3D中使用。

trans-unit.target: 您可以从Blender中导出透视和正交相机,以便在Qt Quick 3D中使用。

trans-unit.source: You can filter events for any other item by installing event filters. This functionality is separate from Qt's regular event filters (see QObject::installEventFilter()), which only work on subclasses of QObject. After installing your item as an event filter for another item by calling installSceneEventFilter(), the filtered events will be received by the virtual function sceneEventFilter(). You can remove item event filters by calling removeSceneEventFilter().
trans-unit.target: 您可以通过安装事件过滤器来过滤任何其他项目的事件。此功能与Qt的常规事件过滤器（请参阅QObject :: installEventFilter（））分开，后者仅适用于QObject的子类。在通过调用installSceneEventFilter（）将项目安装为另一个项目的事件过滤器之后，虚拟函数sceneEventFilter（）将接收过滤的事件。您可以通过调用removeSceneEventFilter（）来删除项目事件过滤器。

trans-unit.source: You can filter the images in an image directory using the images.fileextensions variable. The general idea behind the images.fileextensions variable is to enable different image format for different output format.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用 images.fileextensions 变量过滤图像目录中的图像。 images.fileextensions 变量背后的总体思路是为不同的输出格式启用不同的图像格式。

trans-unit.source: You can get all available device IDs from QtMultimedia.availableCameras. If no value is provided or if set to an empty string, the system's default camera will be used.
trans-unit.target: 您可以从QtMultimedia.availableCameras获取所有可用的设备ID 。如果未提供任何值或设置为空字符串，则将使用系统的默认摄像机。

trans-unit.source: You can get information about the available serial ports using the QSerialPortInfo helper class, which allows an enumeration of all the serial ports in the system. This is useful to obtain the correct name of the serial port you want to use. You can pass an object of the helper class as an argument to the setPort() or setPortName() methods to assign the desired serial device.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用QSerialPortInfo帮助程序类获取有关可用串行端口的信息，该类允许枚举系统中的所有串行端口。这对于获取要使用的串行端口的正确名称很有用。您可以将帮助程序类的对象作为参数传递给setPort（）或setPortName（）方法，以分配所需的串行设备。

trans-unit.source: You can get more information about the specific error by calling the errorString() function; moreover, the patternErrorOffset() function will return the offset inside the pattern string
trans-unit.target: 您可以通过调用errorString（）函数来获取有关特定错误的更多信息；此外，patternErrorOffset（）函数将返回模式字符串内的偏移量

trans-unit.source: You can give hints on how the symbols in the plugin are resolved. By default since Qt 5.7, QLibrary::PreventUnloadHint is set.
trans-unit.target: 您可以提供有关如何解析插件中符号的提示。从Qt 5.7开始，默认设置QLibrary :: PreventUnloadHint。

trans-unit.source: You can give some hints on how the symbols are resolved. Usually, the symbols are not resolved at load time, but resolved lazily, (that is, when resolve() is called). If you set the loadHints to ResolveAllSymbolsHint, then all symbols will be resolved at load time if the platform supports it.
trans-unit.target: 您可以提供一些有关如何解析符号的提示。通常，符号不是在加载时解析的，而是延迟解析的（即，在调用resolve（）时）。如果将loadHints设置为ResolveAllSymbolsHint，那么如果平台支持，所有符号都将在加载时解析。

trans-unit.target: 例如,您可以处理这个信号,以便将新输入的项目添加到模型中。

trans-unit.source: You can hide individual menu items by setting their visible property to false. Hiding items does not affect the startAngle or endAngle; the remaining items will grow to consume the available space.
trans-unit.target: 您可以通过将单个菜单项的visible属性设置为 false 来隐藏它们。隐藏项目不会影响startAngle或endAngle；剩余的物品将消耗可用空间。

trans-unit.source: You can however safely use iterators to remove entries from the hash using the QHash::erase() method. This function can safely be called while iterating, and won't affect the order of items in the hash.
trans-unit.target: 但是，您可以使用QHash :: erase（）方法安全地使用迭代器从哈希中删除条目。可以在迭代时安全地调用此函数，并且不会影响哈希中各项的顺序。

trans-unit.source: You can identify a section using the logicalIndex() and logicalIndexAt() functions, or by its index position, using the visualIndex() and visualIndexAt() functions. The visual index will change if a section is moved, but the logical index will not change.
trans-unit.target: 可以识别使用一个部分logicalIndex（）和logicalIndexAt，或通过其索引位置（）函数，使用visualIndex（）和visualIndexAt（）函数。如果移动了某个部分，则可视索引将更改，但是逻辑索引将保持不变。

trans-unit.source: You can implement onAfterAnimating to do additional processing after each animation step.
trans-unit.target: 你可以在每个动画步骤后实现onAfterAnimating来做额外的处理。

trans-unit.target: 您可以实现onSceneGraphError(error,message),以自定义的方式处理错误,如图形上下文创建失败。如果没有连接到该信号的处理程序,Quick将打印出

trans-unit.source: You can implement the stream operator used by qDebug() to provide debugging support for your classes. The class that implements the stream is QDebug. Use QDebugStateSaver to temporarily save the formatting options of the stream. Use nospace() and QTextStream manipulators to further customize the formatting.
trans-unit.target: 您可以实现qDebug（）使用的流运算符，以为您的类提供调试支持。实现流的类是 QDebug 。使用 QDebugStateSaver 临时保存流的格式设置选项。使用nospace（）和QTextStream操作器可以进一步自定义格式。

trans-unit.source: You can implement the stream operator used by qDebug() to provide debugging support for your classes. The class that implements the stream is QDebug. Use QDebugStateSaver to temporarily save the formatting options of the stream. Use nospace() and QTextStream manipulators to further customize the formatting.
trans-unit.target: 您可以实现qDebug（）使用的流运算符，以为您的类提供调试支持。实现流的类是 QDebug 。使用 QDebugStateSaver 临时保存流的格式设置选项。使用nospace（）和QTextStream操作器可以进一步自定义格式。

trans-unit.target: 您可以将函数名称加“（）”作为\ overload命令的参数，该命令将包含一个标准

trans-unit.source: You can increment (or decrement) a date by a given number of days using addDays(). Similarly you can use addMonths() and addYears(). The daysTo() function returns the number of days between two dates.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用addDays（）将日期增加（或减少）给定的天数。同样，您可以使用addMonths（）和addYears（）。该daysTo（）函数返回的天两个日期之间的数字。

trans-unit.source: You can increment (or decrement) a datetime by a given number of milliseconds using addMSecs(), seconds using addSecs(), or days using addDays(). Similarly, you can use addMonths() and addYears(). The daysTo() function returns the number of days between two datetimes, secsTo() returns the number of seconds between two datetimes, and msecsTo() returns the number of milliseconds between two datetimes. These operations are aware of daylight-saving time (DST) and other time-zone transitions, where applicable.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用毫秒的给定数量的增加（或减少）日期时间addMSecs（），用秒addSecs（），或使用天addDays（）。同样，您可以使用addMonths（）和addYears（）。所述daysTo（）函数返回天两个日期时间之间的数，secsTo（）返回的秒2个日期时间之间的数量，并且msecsTo（）返回两个日期时间之间的毫秒数。这些操作知道夏时制（DST）和其他时区转换（如果适用）。

trans-unit.source: You can inherit this class when you need to create a QSharedPointer from any instance of a class; for instance, from within the object itself. The key point is that the technique of just returning QSharedPointer<T>(this) cannot be used, because this winds up creating multiple distinct QSharedPointer objects with separate reference counts. For this reason you must never create more than one QSharedPointer from the same raw pointer.
trans-unit.target: 当您需要从类的任何实例创建QSharedPointer时，可以继承此类。例如，从对象本身内部。关键是不能使用仅返回QSharedPointer <T>（this）的技术，因为这最终会创建具有不同引用计数的多个不同的QSharedPointer对象。因此，您绝不能从同一原始指针创建多个QSharedPointer。

trans-unit.source: You can insert custom objects into a QTextDocument; see the QTextObjectInterface class description for details.
trans-unit.target: 您可以将自定义对象插入QTextDocument中；有关详细信息，请参见QTextObjectInterface类描述。

trans-unit.source: You can inspect the globally selected Xcode installation using the same tool.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用相同的工具检查全局选择的Xcode安装。

trans-unit.source: You can install the Qt Framework and tools by using an online or offline installer, or by building the source packages yourself.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用在线或离线安装程序或自己构建源程序包来安装Qt Framework和工具。

trans-unit.source: You can install the Qt Framework and tools by using an online or offline installer, or by building the source packages yourself.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用在线或离线安装程序或自己构建源程序包来安装Qt Framework和工具。

trans-unit.source: You can install the interceptor on a profile via QWebEngineProfile::setUrlRequestInterceptor() or QQuickWebEngineProfile::setUrlRequestInterceptor().
trans-unit.target: 您可以通过QWebEngineProfile :: setUrlRequestInterceptor（）或QQuickWebEngineProfile :: setUrlRequestInterceptor（）在配置文件上安装拦截器。

trans-unit.source: You can instantiate multiple copies of the same replica. All replicas of the same source from a single node will share a private data member which handles the network communication. This means multiple instances of a Replica do not introduce additional network traffic, although there will be some additional processing overhead. Failing to delete replicas will prevent the reference count on this private object from reaching 0, and cause unnecessary network communication until the calling process exits. For this reason, it is recommended that QScopedPointer or QSharedPointer be used to help track replica lifetime.
trans-unit.target: 您可以实例化同一副本的多个副本。来自单个节点的相同源的所有副本将共享一个处理网络通信的私有数据成员。这意味着副本服务器的多个实例不会引入额外的网络流量，尽管会产生一些额外的处理开销。无法删除副本将阻止此私有对象上的引用计数达到0，并导致不必要的网络通信，直到调用进程退出。因此，建议使用QScopedPointer或QSharedPointer来帮助跟踪副本生存期。

trans-unit.source: You can instantiate multiple copies of the same replica. All replicas of the same source from a single node will share a private data member which handles the network communication. This means multiple instances of a replica do not introduce additional network traffic, although there will be some additional processing overhead. Failing to delete replicas will prevent the reference count on this private object from reaching 0, and cause unnecessary network communication until the calling process exits. For this reason, it is recommended to use QScopedPointer or QSharedPointer to help track the lifetime of replicas.
trans-unit.target: 您可以实例化同一副本的多个副本。来自单个节点的同一源的所有副本将共享一个处理网络通信的私有数据成员。这意味着副本的多个实例不会引入额外的网络流量，尽管会产生一些额外的处理开销。无法删除副本将阻止此私有对象上的引用计数达到0，并导致不必要的网络通信，直到调用进程退出。因此，建议使用QScopedPointer或QSharedPointer来帮助跟踪副本的生存期。

trans-unit.source: You can interface with non-Qt clients in a multi-process system, as long as your clients understand Wayland or X11. For example, if you use gstreamer for video or if you want to use a navigation application built with another UI toolkit, you can run these clients alongside your other Qt-based clients.
trans-unit.target: 只要你的客户端了解Wayland或X11,你就可以在多进程系统中与非Qt客户端进行接口。例如,如果你使用gstreamer来制作视频,或者你想使用另一个UI工具包构建的导航应用程序,你可以在其他基于Qt的客户端旁边运行这些客户端。

trans-unit.source: You can iterate over a frame's contents using the QTextFrame::iterator class: this provides read-only access to its internal list of text blocks and child frames.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用QTextFrame :: iterator类遍历框架的内容：这提供对其内部文本块和子框架列表的只读访问。

trans-unit.source: You can just set the parameters you need and then kick a task off. In order to finalize the configuration of a task you must invoke QtConcurrent::QTaskBuilder::spawn. This function is non-blocking (i.e. returns a future object immediately), but it's not guaranteed that the task starts immediately. You can use the QFuture and QFutureWatcher classes to monitor the status of the task.
trans-unit.target: 您可以只设置所需的参数，然后启动任务。为了完成任务的配置，您必须调用QtConcurrent :: QTaskBuilder :: spawn。此函数是非阻塞的（即立即返回将来的对象），但不能保证任务立即启动。您可以使用QFuture和QFutureWatcher类来监视任务的状态。

trans-unit.source: You can localize numbers by using appropriate tr() strings:
trans-unit.target: 你可以通过使用适当的 tr()字符串来本地化数字。

trans-unit.source: You can make a combo box editable by setting the editable property. An editable combo box will autocomplete its text based on what is available in the model.
trans-unit.target: 您可以通过设置editable属性来使组合框可编辑。可编辑的组合框将根据模型中的可用内容自动完成其文本。

trans-unit.source: You can make as many connections as you like between objects on the form; it is possible to connect signals from objects to slots in the form itself. As a result, the signal and slot connections in many dialogs can be completely configured from within
trans-unit.target: 您可以在表单上的对象之间进行任意数量的连接;也可以将对象的信号连接到表单本身的插槽上。因此,许多对话框中的信号和槽位连接可以在以下界面中完全配置

trans-unit.source: You can make the cells fill the available space by stretching the last header section. Access the relevant header using horizontalHeader() or verticalHeader() and set the header's stretchLastSection property.
trans-unit.target: 您可以通过拉伸最后一个标题部分来使单元格填充可用空间。使用horizo​​ntalHeader（）或verticalHeader（）访问相关的标头，并设置标头的StretchLastSection属性。

trans-unit.source: You can manually post events to any object in any thread at any time using the thread-safe function QCoreApplication::postEvent(). The events will automatically be dispatched by the event loop of the thread where the object was created.
trans-unit.target: 您可以随时使用线程安全函数QCoreApplication :: postEvent（）将事件手动发布到任何线程中的任何对象。这些事件将由创建对象的线程的事件循环自动调度。

trans-unit.source: You can map coordinates and shapes to and from an item's scene by calling QGraphicsItem::mapToScene() and QGraphicsItem::mapFromScene(). You can also map to an item's parent item by calling QGraphicsItem::mapToParent() and QGraphicsItem::mapFromParent(), or between items by calling QGraphicsItem::mapToItem() and QGraphicsItem::mapFromItem(). All mapping functions can map both points, rectangles, polygons and paths.
trans-unit.target: 您可以通过调用QGraphicsItem :: mapToScene（）和QGraphicsItem :: mapFromScene（）在项目场景之间来回映射坐标和形状。您也可以通过调用映射到某个项目的父项的QGraphicsItem :: mapToParent（）和的QGraphicsItem :: mapFromParent（），或项目通过调用之间的QGraphicsItem :: mapToItem（）和的QGraphicsItem :: mapFromItem（）。所有的映射功能都可以映射点，矩形，多边形和路径。

trans-unit.source: You can minimize the space consumption of a group box by enabling the flat property. In most styles, enabling this property results in the removal of the left, right and bottom edges of the frame.
trans-unit.target: 您可以通过启用flat属性来最小化组框的空间消耗。在大多数样式中，启用此属性会导致删除框架的左，右和下边缘。

trans-unit.source: You can minimize the space consumption of a group box by enabling the flat property. In most styles, enabling this property results in the removal of the left, right and bottom edges of the frame.

trans-unit.target: 你可以将普通按钮和标准按钮进行混搭。

trans-unit.source: You can navigate within the dataset using QSqlQuery::next(), QSqlQuery::previous(), QSqlQuery::first(), QSqlQuery::last(), and QSqlQuery::seek(). The current row index is returned by QSqlQuery::at(), and the total number of rows in the result set is available as QSqlQuery::size() for databases that support it.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用QSqlQuery :: next（），QSqlQuery :: previous（），QSqlQuery :: first（），QSqlQuery :: last（）和QSqlQuery :: seek（）在数据集中导航。当前行索引由QSqlQuery :: at（）返回，结果集中的总行数可作为QSqlQuery :: size（）用于支持它的数据库。

trans-unit.source: You can nest layouts using addLayout() on a layout; the inner layout then becomes a child of the layout it is inserted into.
trans-unit.target: 您可以在布局上使用 addLayout() 嵌套布局；然后，内部布局将成为其插入的布局的子级。

trans-unit.target: 您可以使用elementsByTagName（）或elementsByTagNameNS（）获得具有特定标签的所有元素的列表。

trans-unit.source: You can obtain audio formats compatible with the audio device used through functions in QAudioDeviceInfo. This class also lets you query available parameter values for a device, so that you can set the parameters yourself. See the QAudioDeviceInfo class description for details. You need to know the format of the audio streams you wish to play or record.
trans-unit.target: 您可以通过QAudioDeviceInfo中的功能获得与使用的音频设备兼容的音频格式。该类还允许您查询设备的可用参数值，以便您可以自己设置参数。有关详细信息，请参见QAudioDeviceInfo类描述。您需要知道要播放或录制的音频流的格式。

trans-unit.target: 您只能选择一种或另一种模式。

trans-unit.target: 您只能在状态机运行或启动时发布事件。

trans-unit.source: You can open the resource selector by clicking Choose Resource... to add resources any time during the design process.
trans-unit.target: 您可以在设计过程中随时单击“选择资源...”以打开资源选择器。

trans-unit.source: You can override the default configuration for categories either by setting logging rules, or by installing a custom filter.
trans-unit.target: 您可以通过设置日志规则或安装自定义过滤器来覆盖类别的默认配置。

trans-unit.source: You can override this behavior by using the QAction::menuRole() property.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用QAction :: menuRole（）属性覆盖此行为。

trans-unit.source: You can override this function for your delegate if you need extra logic to decide which transition to return. You could for example introspect the items, and return different animations depending on the their internal state. StackView will expect you to return a Component that contains a StackViewTransition, or a StackViewTransition directly. The former is easier, as StackView will then create the transition and later destroy it when it's done, while avoiding any side effects caused by the transition being alive long after it has run. Returning a StackViewTransition directly can be useful if you need to write some sort of transition caching for performance reasons. As an optimization, you can also return null to signal that you just want to show/hide the items immediately without creating or running any transitions. You can also override this function if you need to alter the items in any way before the transition starts.
trans-unit.target: 如果需要额外的逻辑来确定要返回的转换，则可以为委托重写此功能。例如，您可以对项目进行内省，并根据其内部状态返回不同的动画。StackView希望您返回一个包含StackViewTransition或直接包含StackViewTransition的组件。前者比较容易，因为StackView然后将创建过渡并在完成后销毁它，同时避免了过渡运行很长时间后仍存活的任何副作用。如果出于性能原因需要编写某种过渡缓存，则直接返回StackViewTransition会很有用。作为优化，您还可以返回 null 表示您只想立即显示/隐藏项目，而无需创建或运行任何过渡。如果您需要在过渡开始之前以任何方式更改项目，则也可以覆盖此功能。

trans-unit.source: You can override this function for your delegate if you need extra logic to decide which transition to return. You could for example introspect the items, and return different animations depending on the their internal state. StackView will expect you to return a Component that contains a StackViewTransition, or a StackViewTransition directly. The former is easier, as StackView will then create the transition and later destroy it when it's done, while avoiding any side effects caused by the transition being alive long after it has run. Returning a StackViewTransition directly can be useful if you need to write some sort of transition caching for performance reasons. As an optimization, you can also return null to signal that you just want to show/hide the items immediately without creating or running any transitions. You can also override this function if you need to alter the items in any way before the transition starts.
trans-unit.target: 如果需要额外的逻辑来确定要返回的转换，则可以为委托重写此功能。例如，您可以对项目进行自省，并根据其内部状态返回不同的动画。StackView期望您返回一个包含StackViewTransition或直接包含StackViewTransition的组件。前者比较容易，因为StackView然后将创建过渡并在完成后销毁它，同时避免了过渡运行很长时间后仍存活的任何副作用。如果出于性能原因需要编写某种过渡缓存，则直接返回StackViewTransition会很有用。作为优化，您还可以返回 null 表示您只想立即显示/隐藏项目，而无需创建或运行任何过渡。如果您需要在过渡开始之前以任何方式更改项目，则也可以覆盖此功能。

trans-unit.source: You can pass one or two integer parameters to Q_REVISION. If you pass one parameter, it denotes the minor version only. This means that the major version is unspecified. If you pass two, the first parameter is the major version and the second parameter is the minor version.
trans-unit.target: 您可以将一个或两个整数参数传递给 Q_REVISION 。如果传递一个参数，则仅表示次要版本。这意味着未指定主要版本。如果您传递两个，则第一个参数是主要版本，第二个参数是次要版本。

trans-unit.source: You can pass your own classes as handlers, provided that they have a public static function void cleanup(T *pointer).
trans-unit.target: 您可以将自己的类作为处理程序传递，只要它们具有公共静态函数 void cleanup(T *pointer) 。

trans-unit.source: You can post your own events to the state machine using QStateMachine::postEvent().
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用QStateMachine :: postEvent（）将自己的事件发布到状态机。

trans-unit.source: You can provide custom editors by using a QItemEditorFactory. The Color Editor Factory Example shows how a custom editor can be made available to delegates with the default item editor factory. This way, there is no need to subclass QItemDelegate. An alternative is to reimplement createEditor(), setEditorData(), setModelData(), and updateEditorGeometry(). This process is described in the Spin Box Delegate Example.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用QItemEditorFactory提供自定义编辑器。 “ 颜色编辑器工厂示例”显示了如何使用默认项目编辑器工厂将自定义编辑器提供给代表。这样，就无需子类QItemDelegate。另一种方法是重新实现createEditor（），setEditorData（），setModelData（）和updateEditorGeometry（）。旋转框委托示例中描述了此过程。

An alternative is to reimplement createEditor(), setEditorData(), setModelData(), and updateEditorGeometry(). This process is described in the Spin Box Delegate Example.

An alternative is to reimplement createEditor(), setEditorData(), setModelData(), and updateEditorGeometry(). This process is described in the Spin Box Delegate Example.

trans-unit.source: You can provide substitutions for font family names using insertSubstitution() and insertSubstitutions(). Substitutions can be removed with removeSubstitutions(). Use substitute() to retrieve a family's first substitute, or the family name itself if it has no substitutes. Use substitutes() to retrieve a list of a family's substitutes (which may be empty).
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用insertSubstitution（）和insertSubstitutions（）替换字体系列名称。可以使用removeSubstitutions（）移除替代。使用替代（）检索家庭的第一个替代者，如果没有替代者，则使用家族名称本身。使用替代品（）检索家庭替代品的列表（可能为空）。

trans-unit.source: You can provide substitutions for font family names using insertSubstitution() and insertSubstitutions(). Substitutions can be removed with removeSubstitutions(). Use substitute() to retrieve a family's first substitute, or the family name itself if it has no substitutes. Use substitutes() to retrieve a list of a family's substitutes (which may be empty). After substituting a font, you must trigger the updating of the font by destroying and re-creating all QFont objects.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用insertSubstitution（）和insertSubstitutions（）来替换字体系列名称。可以使用removeSubstitutions（）移除替代。使用替代（）检索家庭的第一个替代者，如果没有替代者，则使用家族名称本身。使用替代品（）检索家庭替代品的列表（可能为空）。替换字体后，必须通过销毁并重新创建所有QFont对象来触发字体更新。

trans-unit.source: You can select which byte order to use when serializing data. The default setting is big endian (MSB first). trans-unit.source: You can set the pixmap's transformation mode by calling setTransformationMode(). By default, Qt::FastTransformation is used, which provides fast, non-smooth scaling. Qt::SmoothTransformation enables QPainter::SmoothPixmapTransform on the painter, and the quality depends on the platform and viewport. The result is usually not as good as calling QPixmap::scale() directly. Call transformationMode() to get the current transformation mode for the item.
trans-unit.target: 您可以通过调用setTransformationMode（）来设置像素图的转换模式。默认情况下，使用Qt :: FastTransformation，它提供了快速，平滑的缩放比例。Qt :: SmoothTransformation启用Painter上的QPainter :: SmoothPixmapTransform，其质量取决于平台和视口。结果通常不如直接调用QPixmap :: scale（）好。调用TransformationMode（）以获取该项目的当前转换模式。

trans-unit.source: You can set the prefix for the current namespace with setPrefix(), and get the list of current prefixes (or those for a given URI) with prefixes(). The namespace URI is available from uri(). Use pushContext() to start a new namespace context, and popContext() to return to the previous namespace context. Use splitName() or processName() to split a name into its prefix and local name.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用setPrefix（）设置当前名称空间的前缀，并获取带有前缀（）的当前前缀列表（或给定URI的列表）。可以从uri（）获得名称空间URI 。使用pushContext（）启动新的名称空间上下文，并使用popContext（）返回先前的名称空间上下文。使用splitName（）或processName（）将名称拆分为其前缀和本地名称。

trans-unit.source: You can set whether an item should be visible (i.e., drawn, and accepting events), by calling setVisible(). Hiding an item will also hide its children. Similarly, you can enable or disable an item by calling setEnabled(). If you disable an item, all its children will also be disabled. By default, items are both visible and enabled. To toggle whether an item is selected or not, first enable selection by setting the ItemIsSelectable flag, and then call setSelected(). Normally, selection is toggled by the scene, as a result of user interaction.
trans-unit.target: 您可以通过调用setVisible（）来设置项目是否应可见（即，绘制并接受事件）。隐藏项目也会隐藏其子项。同样，您可以通过调用setEnabled（）启用或禁用项目。如果禁用某个项目，则其所有子项也将被禁用。默认情况下，项目既可见又启用。若要切换是否选择项目，请首先通过设置ItemIsSelectable标志启用选择，然后调用setSelected（）。通常，由于用户交互，场景会切换选择。

trans-unit.source: You can specify multiple import paths in the QML2_IMPORT_PATH environment variable by joining them using the path separator. On Windows the path separator is a semicolon (;), on other platforms it is a colon (:). This means that you cannot specify resource paths or URLs in QML2_IMPORT_PATH, as they contain colons themselves. However, you can add resource paths and URLs by calling QQmlEngine::addImportPath() programatically.
trans-unit.target: 您可以通过使用路径分隔符将它们导入来在 QML2_IMPORT_PATH 环境变量中指定多个导入路径。在Windows上，路径分隔符是分号（;），在其他平台上则是冒号（:)。这意味着您无法在QML2_IMPORT_PATH中指定资源路径或URL，因为它们本身包含冒号。但是，您可以通过以编程方式调用QQmlEngine :: addImportPath（）来添加资源路径和URL 。

trans-unit.source: You can specify platform-specific arguments for the -platform option. Place them after the platform plugin name following a colon as a comma-separated list. For example, -platform windows:dialogs=xp,fontengine=freetype.
trans-unit.target: 您可以为 -platform 选项指定特定于平台的参数。将它们放在平台插件名称之后，并用冒号作为逗号分隔列表。例如， -platform windows:dialogs=xp,fontengine=freetype 。

trans-unit.source: You can specify the minimum and maximum number of steps with setMinimum() and setMaximum. The current number of steps is set with setValue(). The progress bar can be rewound to the beginning with reset().

trans-unit.source: You can use QCompleter to provide auto completions in any Qt widget, such as QLineEdit and QComboBox. When the user starts typing a word, QCompleter suggests possible ways of completing the word, based on a word list. The word list is provided as a QAbstractItemModel. (For simple applications, where the word list is static, you can pass a QStringList to QCompleter's constructor.)
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用QCompleter在任何Qt小部件（例如QLineEdit和QComboBox）中提供自动完成功能。当用户开始键入单词时，QCompleter会根据单词列表建议完成单词的可能方法。单词列表作为QAbstractItemModel提供。 （对于单词列表是静态的简单应用程序，可以将QStringList传递给QCompleter的构造函数。）

trans-unit.source: You can use QDirIterator to navigate entries of a directory one at a time. It is similar to QDir::entryList() and QDir::entryInfoList(), but because it lists entries one at a time instead of all at once, it scales better and is more suitable for large directories. It also supports listing directory contents recursively, and following symbolic links. Unlike QDir::entryList(), QDirIterator does not support sorting.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用QDirIterator一次浏览一个目录条目。它与QDir :: entryList（）和QDir :: entryInfoList（）相似，但是由于它一次列出一个条目，而不是一次列出所有条目，因此扩展性更好，并且更适合于大型目录。它还支持递归列出目录内容，并遵循符号链接。与QDir :: entryList（）不同，QDirIterator不支持排序。

trans-unit.source: You may want to make your custom style available for use in other applications, which may not be yours and hence not available for you to recompile. Please refer to the Qt Plugin documentation for more information on how to go about creating a style plugin.

trans-unit.source: You may wish to read/write your own raw binary data to/from the data stream directly. Data may be read from the stream into a preallocated char * using readRawData(). trans-unit.target: 您可能希望直接从数据流读取/写入自己的原始二进制数据。可以使用readRawData（）将数据从流中读取到预分配的 char * 中。类似地，可以使用writeRawData（）将数据写入流。请注意，数据的任何编码/解码都必须由您完成。

trans-unit.source: You might want to experiment with different configure flags, and therefore run configure multiple times. Note that CMake caches configure options and information about the environment in a file called CMakeCache.txt. Delete this file when you want to start over without cached information.
trans-unit.target: 你可能想用不同的configure标志进行实验,因此要多次运行configure。注意 CMake 会在一个叫 CMakeCache.txt 的文件中缓存配置选项和环境信息。当你想在没有缓存信息的情况下重新开始时,请删除这个文件。

trans-unit.source: You should always use client libraries that have been compiled with the same compiler as you are using for your project. If you cannot get a source distibution to compile the client libraries yourself, you must make sure that the pre-compiled library is compatible with your compiler, otherwise you will get a lot of "undefined symbols" errors. Some compilers have tools to convert libraries, e.g. Borland ships the tool COFF2OMF.EXE to convert libraries that have been generated with Microsoft Visual C++.

trans-unit.source: You should never exit the application within this signal. Instead, the session manager may or may not do this afterwards, depending on the context. Furthermore, most session managers will very likely request a saved state immediately after the application has been started. This permits the session manager to learn about the application's restart policy.
trans-unit.target: 你永远不应该在这个信号内退出应用程序。相反,会话管理器可能会在之后退出,也可能不会,这取决于上下文。此外,大多数会话管理器很可能会在应用程序启动后立即请求保存状态,这允许会话管理器了解应用程序的重启策略。这允许会话管理器了解应用程序的重启策略。

trans-unit.source: You should not call QLayoutItem::setGeometry() twice on the same item in the same function. This call can be very expensive if the item has several child widgets, because the layout manager must do a complete layout every time. Instead, calculate the geometry and then set it. (This does not only apply to layouts, you should do the same if you implement your own resizeEvent(), for example.)
trans-unit.target: 您不应在同一函数中的同一项目上两次调用QLayoutItem :: setGeometry（）。如果项目具有多个子窗口小部件，则此调用可能会非常昂贵，因为布局管理器每次都必须完成完整的布局。取而代之的是计算几何形状然后进行设置。（这不仅适用于布局，例如，如果实现自己的resizeEvent（），则应该执行相同的操作。）

trans-unit.source: You use the FRAMEWORK_HEADERS variable to specify the headers required by a particular framework. Appending it to the QMAKE_BUNDLE_DATA variable ensures that information about these headers is added to the collection of resources that will be installed with the library bundle. Also, the framework name and version are specified by the QMAKE_FRAMEWORK_BUNDLE_NAME and QMAKE_FRAMEWORK_VERSION variables. By default, the values used for these variables are obtained from the TARGET and VERSION variables.
trans-unit.target: 您使用 FRAMEWORK_HEADERS 变量来指定特定框架所需的标题。将其附加到 QMAKE_BUNDLE_DATA 变量可确保将有关这些标头的信息添加到将与库捆绑软件一起安装的资源集合中。同样，框架名称和版本由QMAKE_FRAMEWORK_BUNDLE_NAME和QMAKE_FRAMEWORK_VERSION变量指定。默认情况下，用于这些变量的值是从TARGET和VERSION变量获得的。

trans-unit.source: Your custom QGestureRecognizer subclass needs to reimplement the recognize() function to handle and filter the incoming input events for QWidget and QGraphicsObject subclasses. Although the logic for gesture recognition is implemented in this function, you can store persistent information about the state of the recognition process in the QGesture object supplied. The recognize() function must return a value of QGestureRecognizer::Result that indicates the state of recognition for a given gesture and target object. This determines whether or not a gesture event will be delivered to a target object.
trans-unit.target: 您的自定义QGestureRecognizer子类需要重新实现识别（）函数来处理和筛选传入输入事件的QWidget和QGraphicsObject子类。尽管此功能实现了手势识别的逻辑，但是您可以在所提供的QGesture对象中存储有关识别过程状态的持久信息。的识别（）函数必须返回的值QGestureRecognizer ::结果指示识别的状态对于给定的手势和目标对象。这确定手势事件是否将传递到目标对象。

trans-unit.target: 视图的缩放系数。有效值在 0.25 到 5.0 的范围内。默认因子为 1.0 。

trans-unit.source: Zoom in/out within the allowable zoom range set for Q3DCamera.
trans-unit.target: 在Q3DCamera设置的允许缩放范围内放大/缩小。

trans-unit.source: Zooming can be accomplished in a number of ways - usually the more expensive but higher quality approach is an optical zoom, which allows using the full extent of the camera sensor to gather image pixels. In addition it is possible to digitally zoom, which will generally just enlarge part of the sensor frame and throw away other parts. If the camera hardware supports optical zoom this should generally always be used first. The maximumOpticalZoom() method allows this to be checked. The zoomTo() method allows changing both optical and digital zoom at once.
trans-unit.target: 缩放可以通过多种方式完成-通常更昂贵但质量更高的方法是光学缩放，它允许使用摄像机传感器的全部范围来收集图像像素。另外，可以进行数字缩放，通常仅放大传感器框架的一部分，而丢弃其他部分。如果相机硬件支持光学变焦，通常应首先使用。所述maximumOpticalZoom（）方法允许此进行检查。所述zoomTo（）方法允许在一次改变光学和数字变焦。

trans-unit.source: Zooming can be asynchronous with value changes reported with currentDigitalZoomChanged() and currentOpticalZoomChanged() signals.
trans-unit.target: 缩放可以与currentDigitalZoomChanged（）和currentOpticalZoomChanged（）信号报告的值更改异步进行。
